title: I'm not lying, someone ACTUALLY SAID THIS.
body:
I'm playing Pyke support despite not wanting to play support at all, I'm giving her gold with my ult and we're doing great. She AFKs in base. I'm like "Vayne?" She's like "Wut?" I said "Just checking if you're still there". She says "I got tilted because you keep KSing"(Let's ignore the fact that I'm pretty much the only reason she's getting any gold and the main reason we're getting any kills). I say "Do you not know Pyke's abilities? You get the gold from my ult...". She says "I want KDA" and leaves me alone in bot lane for the rest of the game in a 2v1 vs Soraka Twitch. We lose the game because there's no teamwork despite 4 of them being on the same club. Like WHAT?!

What's even worse is it was a Vayne and she was basically getting fed, we should have won that game.

replies.body: I get sick of it 2. Let me tell u that  if ur the support and u are getting nearly every kill. u gonna lose that game . Assist gold isn't worth a fuck to an adc .  So what u have effectively done  is neuter the adc  for the rest of the game.  what u fail to get is how much money it takes to get an adc rolling.   im not ssying that I would afk in base though that a little extreme, but u def not getting any honors
{{champion:555}}  Give's his teamates kill gold not assist gold.

I think this is a problem typical in low level league, noone understands anyone elses abilities properly outside the few adc they play. Even then most don't know how their own abilities work, "thanks for condemning him out of my Sona R range, oh btw you know its best when he's near a wall right? OK just checking."...

Oh and the term KS is laughable as a support, oh so I stunned him, did most of the damage, last hit him and kept you alive but I "KS" you, gee im soooooo sorry.
You do realise Pyke gives his teammates full kill gold upon executing someone? They just do not get the kill credit.
You are probably the vayne from the game hes talking about
Iron IV*

Disregard the fact that it was fucking Pyke.

I can play an effective adc with zero kills. I can be a fed support and build it into a deadly AP carry.

I'm not going to look this shit up, but what is your rating? Have you been chatrestricted for raging recently?
plus a fed support literally carries the whole lane. i've had games won because our braum was literally 1v2'ing botlane.
I like to play braum and I can say that when your adc leaves for whatever reason it makes it hard to play, so im glad that you give credit to a good braum.

Sadly a lot of people still have this KDA mentality that usually stems off of Shooter games where they believe that is the only thing that matters is the game.

You have to remember at the very least Pyke is still new so some people still might not understand. But you also have people who don't understand that Thresh lantern can save you, as well as what Relic Shield does! 

Either that I'd this Vayne only wanted to up her Masteries (by getting S rank which for an ADC means getting kills) but that shouldn't be the reason to AFK!
there was a thread recently that said that most scores had little to do with it.  CS was apparently a large factor in everything, including support and jungle
I've gotten an S with 0 cs as support.
I don't think you know how S works.
This comment makes no sense.

Getting an S comes off of how other people have performed within that role on the same champion you played.
So depending on what support you are playing, it makes complete sense that having 0 CS could still get you an S

Lux, Janna, Soraka and Teemo have all been done.

Also I was responding to someone saying you need CS to get an S in the support role.
Ok, was unsure because you replied to me.

picture if they got rid of assists in the kda metre and just showed takedowns/deaths

say twitch is 7/3/1 he would be 8/3

say im mid and am 1/4/12 i would be 13/4

with "ks" it seems to get a lot more of an accurate description of usefullness or good kda

>

> 
> Either that I'd this Vayne only wanted to up her Masteries (by getting S rank which for an ADC means getting kills) but that shouldn't be the reason to AFK!

I still have people running over my {{champion:432}}  chimes full health thinking they just give a move speed boost. Supports sure seem to get {{champion:412}} lanturn syndrome more than any other class. People act like they never know what their supports do.
What do you expect in a game the makes ADC mains feel like the whole world revolves around them?

> [{quoted}](name=Raoul,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LwmUcQRl,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-09-30T09:40:57.217+0000)
>
> What do you expect in a game the makes ADC mains feel like the whole world revolves around them?

I suppose there's also the fact that Vayne is or used to be in the unholy trinity of toxicity and this person was pretty obviously a Vayne main.
Tbh this is true most Vayne mains are stuck up toxic twats. With no offense if your not.
What's the trinity? Riven Yas and Vayne?

> [{quoted}](name=ZygfrydGamomg,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LwmUcQRl,comment-id=000500000001,timestamp=2018-09-30T13:10:05.523+0000)
>
> What's the trinity? Riven Yas and Vayne?

I believe when there WAS a Trinity it was Yasuo(or maybe Riven) Katarina and Vayne. I don't think Katarina mains are as toxic as they used to be though. I don't think I am for sure.
before yasuo came the trinity was zed, vayne and riven, expanded on yi and yasuo now
I hate KDA players.

> [{quoted}](name=Bondy,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LwmUcQRl,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2018-09-30T15:05:39.446+0000)
>
> I hate KDA players.

Me too. One of my biggest frustrations since the ranking system came out, as much fun as it is at times, is the reluctance of players seeking an S rank to get involved in any fights that don't serve up kills on a silver platter. Many times I've watched players wait in what would have been a 4v4 or 5v5 until the 3/4 teammates that engaged are dead, but the remaining enemies are reeeeaaaaaal low, only to go in and pick up the kills afterwards. We might lose the game over that fight. But hey, summoner123 got an S on Renekton I guess
Report cass, 30 mins no boots

as an ADC main i kinda have an insight into this..
ADC players are always shit on as the "cry baby" position.. and told we're "being babysat" but at the same time always expected to have these amazing numbers.. if you're an ADC and your KDA isn't positive (assist don't count for some reason) people will talk so much shit..
even if i'm 0/3/17 all they'll see is the 0/3.. and be like "You're such a bad ADC" blah blah blah..
and so that mindset gets burned into us, that we have to have this amazing KDA or else we aren't contributing (even if we're helping in other ways) 

ADC is a thankless role.. you're expected to carry (literally in the name Attack Damage Carry), but at the same time noone wants to help you get fed enough to make it happen.. people are really toxic to ADC mains for this reason, then get upset when we get toxic back because of how toxic they are to us.. and WE get labeled the toxic role..

so even if you're a good player and YOU realize that the ADC doesn't have to have the kills, they're probably worried about how other people are gonna look at them.. they wanna save face and have this amazing KDA..

the boards are so guilty of this.. anytime you make a good argument, someone will go and look at your match history and KDA and judge your entire point on that, even if your match history doesn't reflect your skill at all..

unfortunately KDA doesn't reflect skill because of situations like this one..

anyway.. i'm sorry that happened to you..

Junglers never get honored? Top laners never get honored? Are we playing the same game? Jesus, they always get honored if they do remotely well in my games.

The only role who really doesn't get honored if they do well is support unless it's a blitz or thresh.

As a jungle main, I wanna live in the world you live in. I can go 2-0-18 on Sejuani with many crucial ults that led to us winning the game from numbers advantage while maintaining crab control and smite-stealing at least one drake and all honors will go to the 10-11 ADC with the life expectancy of an lemming with leprosy constantly face-checking non warded bushes with no one showing on the map because they did the pewpew and had a big damage graph. League doesn't seem to care about the objective play any more, people circlejerk KDA like they don't remember when LCS was nothing but a single teamfight before the game ended.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldVGateKeeper,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LwmUcQRl,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2018-09-30T08:32:16.951+0000)
>
> "Adc is a thankless role"
> 
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
> 
> Are you forgetting about junglers or top? They almost never get honored and jungle is routinely blamed for the team losing even if they do everything for the team.

I play Ivern.

Hey Ivern need a leash? IM IVERN
Hey Ivern why dont you take this blue buff I weakened for you? IM IVERN
Hey Ivern can you summon daisy to hit this inhibitor? IT  DOSENT WORK THAT WAY IM FREAKING IVERN


Lol support is semithankless. You only get an honor from your adc, and only on special occasions
Literally the only downfall to any adc that builds {{item:3153}} and lets their teammates finish off the enemies who they shredded down...

> [{quoted}](name=Super Cow Swag,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LwmUcQRl,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-09-30T06:36:35.872+0000)
>
> Literally the only downfall to any adc that builds {{item:3153}} and lets their teammates finish off the enemies who they shredded down...

consider Press the attack, a common ADC rune (especially on Vayne mind you) it makes all damage from all sources deal more damage to your target after 3 consecutive auto attacks.. so assuming your ADC is kiting an enemy champion hard, and almost has them dead, you come in for an attack, just to assist, and end up dealing more damage than you meant to and get the kill.. that ADC still did more than their fair share, but noone is gonna see it that way..

Usually people who focus purely on KDA are toxic people who don't really have the feeling of accomplishments in real life, so they force their mentality into videogames and rely on KDA's to feel good about themselves

Wow, the fact that you thought that this was toxic enough to post baffles me, I just got perma banned for running it down mid in a game we were winning by 14 kills over a jungle camp. Toughen up. You don’t even know what the word toxic means until you play on oce.
Translation; "I'm toxic and am shocked you are upset someone slightly less toxic than me was toxic too."
Report her and laugh when she gets her 14 day. All ADCs are bronze, its just some of them get carried beyond it by us supports.

pyke is the best champ 
if they dont know how to deal with him ir against him thats their problem
Sometimes you gotta just laugh at the ridiculous things people like this Vayne do.
The vayne is gold 5 LOL but im silver 2 so i cant flame :/ still petty of her to afk for kda -_-

> [{quoted}](name=RealKraftyy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LwmUcQRl,comment-id=0019,timestamp=2018-10-01T05:11:55.199+0000)
>
> The vayne is gold 5 LOL but im silver 2 so i cant flame :/ still petty of her to afk for kda -_-

That Vayne also has over 120 ranked games this season. I have around 15 per season.
I have 170 games in ranked (✿◠‿◠) and Im still in silver 2, 0 LP!

Someone told me this in game, "No I suggests some one dodges this shit because I plan to fuck over this jg all game". Still no report card. Oh and it gets fucking better, this was the 3rd match in a row with this player saying and doing the same thing, yay for RIOT...dumbass bitches. I said nothing, yet he still isn't punished, and I went don't a series because of him. Yup, fuck riot and fuck their match making.
Match history does not match this. You had a lower level than her LOL.

I don't understand...

Assists are counted in the KDA as well...
